heading: Ancientâ€™s Lament Dungeon Guide
content: Ancient's Lament fast dungeon with no boss, making it an ideal candidate for running Nightmare Dungeons. It also contains the , which unfortunately isn't that good on its own. Stock up on your Sigils for this one; you'll run it over and over again for massive hordes of loot! While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
